translations: v．恳求，乞求：强烈地请求某人做某事或给予某物。

sentences.sentence: She beseeched him to cut out his drinking and his smoking.
The poor boy beseeched only with his eyes.
sentences.translation: 这个可怜的孩子只能用眼睛哀求。

sentences.sentence: He beseeched his uncle to remove his mother.
sentences.translation: 他哀求他的叔叔去说服他母亲。
